kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
I encourage Xperience by Kentico developers to study the digital marketing concepts and materials so they can take the certified marketer exam. This knowledge is important to delivering a great Xperience solution for marketers.
If anyone has already taken the certification, I'm interested in hearing about your experiences and what kinds of topics you'd recommend people focusing on (maybe things you were less familiar with before the certification).
